page.title: 16LEISURE AND RECREATION in HB
page.content: Most of the outdoor activities in the village take place on the {playing {field.}There is a tennis court,a cricket pitch,B.M.X. track and a football pitch. There are a few private sports grounds,there is the Gliding Field,there is the school field which is only to be used by the school.There is a private fishing pond,Cliff Garner owns it and rents it out to a fishing club.People also fish in the canal.Nearly all the indoor activities are in the {church {or village hall.}For children there are;brownies,Thursday Club,Playschool, Tiny Tots and table tennis.There are also things like sewing class, W.I., keep fit,yoga, popmobility and painting class.There is also an Historical society who are hoping to have a museum and there is badminton.
